text: The Lords of Discipline is a 1983 American drama movie directed by Franc Roddam and was based on the 1980 novel of the same name by Pat Conroy. It stars David Keith, Robert Prosky, Judge Reinhold, Bill Paxton, William Hope, Michael Biehn, Ed Bishop, Jason Connery and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1983 drama movies Category:1980s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in South Carolina
title: The Lords of Discipline (movie)
